ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.user.services

Class FirebaseAuthService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.user.services.FirebaseAuthService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthService

    public class FirebaseAuthService
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthService
    This class describes the Auth service provided by Firebase. It makes use of a FirebaseAccount as this authentication service is always used only if Firebase Realtime Database is available.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RemoteOutcome authAnonymously()
      Perform an anonymous auth.
      RemoteOutcome authWithProvider(AuthProvider authProvider, java.lang.String token)
      Perform the authentication with a certain provider.
      void forceRetrieveData()
      Force a data retrieval.
      AuthAccount getAuthAccount()
      Get the authenticated account or a null reference if no auth has been performed.
      java.lang.String getID()
      Retrieve the ID of the authenticated account, or "null" if no auth has been performed.
      static FirebaseAuthService getInstance()
      Get the reference to the Authentication object.
      android.net.Uri getPhotoUrl()
      Retrieve the photo url of the authenticated account, or Uri.EMPTY if no auth has been performed.
      void signOut(android.content.Context context)
      Sign the current authenticated user out, or do nothing if no auth has been performed.

        public void signOut(android.content.Context context)
        Description copied from interface: AuthService

        Specified by:
        signOut in interface AuthService
        Parameters:

      • forceRetrieveData

        public void forceRetrieveData()
        Force a data retrieval. WARNING: this method SHOULD NOT be used for normal purposes as all the other methods already make sure that data is retrieved correctly.
